actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to transfer the responsibility for setting income limitations and rent income ratios from the Federal Government to State and local agencies.

summary.text: Transfers the responsibility for setting income limitations and rent income ratios from the Federal Government to State agencies where such States have entered into contracts with the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, pursuant to the National Housing Act, for interest reduction payments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to transfer the responsibility for setting income limitations and rent income ratios from the Federal Government to State and local agencies.
